body: Please add a comment why not using DeviceSet's FindDeviceByName() method for future reference. I'm worrying that using the short name of the device won't work in a distributed environment, since many workers will have same short device names and the device pointer may point to a remote device.
body_html: Please add a comment why not using DeviceSet's FindDeviceByName() method for future reference. I'm worrying that using the short name of the device won't work in a distributed environment, since many workers will have same short device names and the device pointer may point to a remote device.
body_text: Please add a comment why not using DeviceSet's FindDeviceByName() method for future reference. I'm worrying that using the short name of the device won't work in a distributed environment, since many workers will have same short device names and the device pointer may point to a remote device.
